General.Name: Pato Chemical Industry Public Company Limited
General.Description: Pato Chemical Industry Public Company Limited manufactures, imports, formulates, and distributes pesticides in Thailand. It offers herbicides, insecticides, acaricides, and fungicides, as well as plant growth regulators and shellfish exterminator. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

1.Name: Dr. Viwat  Trillit
1.Title: MD, Acting Fin. Mang. & Exec. Director

3.Title: Company Sec., Office Mang. & Investor Relation
